name: The Mt. Barret Incident
description:
Your research team is in trouble... microscopic and bloodthirsty trouble! Find out what happened to your fellow researchers and escape Mt. Barret alive!

Music by Virus610

Pixel Art, Story, and Design by D'Ams

Developed for Branches Intermediate https://branches.itch.io/

Special thanks to Mike Ren (https://mikeyren.itch.io/)
